content: When he's back down on the floor after sending out the duplicates, his attacks will be way more aggressive and he'll be more agile. You'll find that he repeats the same variations of attack, they'll just have a wider reach. For example, he'll spin his spear for longer, resulting in fire emerging around him, and then will leave areas of the ground covered in flames.
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'Field_of_Fire_Walkthrough.md', within the main section titled 'Field of Fire Walkthrough', specifically from the subsection 'Fallen Furnace Crater' and the sub-subsection 'Yaoguai King - Red Boy'.
The content is as follows:
When he's back down on the floor after sending out the duplicates, his attacks will be way more aggressive and he'll be more agile. You'll find that he repeats the same variations of attack, they'll just have a wider reach. For example, he'll spin his spear for longer, resulting in fire emerging around him, and then will leave areas of the ground covered in flames.
